artist: Jack Larsen Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description:
Blue dominates.  Plain weave or Twill variation.
Similar to Pomegranate. Blue,teal,olive warp. Lt green, med green weft.Plain weave variation.  Rt. selvedge. Stapled to a Larsen card.  "H-8B" written on top flap of card. (teal, blue, green)
title: Lapis Development Sample
